participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and curious, Emily enjoys exploring new subjects and is always eager to learn.
participant_1.background: I'm not married, but my pets are my family. I start my day with a healthy breakfast of organic granola and fruit. I am in college. I like playing badminton. I like rap music.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: A bit anxious but creative, Michael often channels his worries into writing and blogging about his interests.
participant_2.background: I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight. I am looking for someone. I started a blog about my favorite comic books and animals. I lie to my parents about my kids' behavior. I am afraid of wasting my time and not being productive.

content.text: Good morning! What are you up to today?
Not much, I'm watching a movie. What about you?
I'm getting ready for my day. I have a class in a few minutes.
Oh cool, what class is it?
It's my chemistry class. I'm really excited to learn more about it.
That's great! I love chemistry. My favorite part is making stuff explode.
Me too! I love the smell of sulfur.
I'm not sure I've ever smelled sulfur. I'll have to pay more attention next time I'm in the lab.
You definitely should. It's a really interesting smell.
Okay, I will. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two dogs and two cats.
Oh wow, that's a lot of pets! I only have a fish.
Fish are great pets too! They're so low-maintenance.
Yeah, they are. I don't have to worry about them getting into trouble.
Exactly. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and watch movies.
Me too! I love to read fantasy novels.
I like to read horror novels. They're so scary!
I'm not very good with scary movies or books. They always make me jump.
I love the feeling of being scared. It's so exciting!
I guess I'm just a wimp.
No, you're not. You're just different. Everyone has their own preferences
